auth.validation.recoveryCode: The code must have at least {num} characters!
auth.signIn.title: Sign in to continue
auth.signIn.magicLink.successNotice: You should receive an email with a magic link!
auth.signIn.magicLink.emailDescription: We will send you an email with a special link to sign in with.
auth.signedIn.successNotice: You are successfully signed in to the Shoc Platform with your email {email}.
auth.signedIn.continueNotice: If you want to sign out, please use the following button.
auth.signUp.title: Create an account
auth.confirm.title: Confirm your email address
auth.confirm.codeDescription: You should recieve the code your email.
auth.confirm.requestSuccess.notice: Please check your email to get your confirmation code!
auth.confirm.request.hint: Enter a valid email to request confirmation code!
auth.recover.title: Recover your password
auth.recover.emailDescription: We will send you a recovery code to this email.
auth.recover.codeDescription: The code you've recieved to your email.
auth.recover.requestSuccess.notice: Please check your email to get your recovery code!
auth.recover.request.hint: Enter a valid email to request recovery code!
auth.otp.requestSuccess.notice: Please check your email to get your one-time password!
auth.otp.request.hint: Enter a valid email to request one-time password!
auth.signOut.notice: You are about to sign out from the Shoc Platform.
auth.signOut.confirmationNotice: Are you sure you want to terminate your current session?
auth.error.notice: Unfortunately, we could not process your request due to an error.
auth.pages.notFound.notice: The content you are looking for could not be found.
